title: Intersection (set theory)
summary:
In mathematics, the intersection of two sets 
  
    
      
        A
      
    
    {\displaystyle A}
  
 and 
  
    
      
        B
        ,
      
    
    {\displaystyle B,}
  
 denoted by

        âˆ©

        A

        B

 or equivalently, all elements of
